title: Segfault while syncing
body:
Version: ` teku/v0.12.7-dev-10c2471c/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-13`

Segmentation fault while syncing Medalla from scratch. Heap size was set to 3GB, and there is plenty of system memory available (16GB total).

Systemd restarted Teku and it picked up where it left off, without even losing any peers.

teku.service: Failed with result 'signal'.
